name: yourl
description: cli: your URL are all here

scripts.build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:types && etsc
scripts.pub:local: npm run build && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.pub:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.pub:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.pub:major: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org

author: lshch <lshch.lshch@qq.com>
